sentences.sentence: Kevin said it was a "load of hogwash" that he was not interested in football.
sentences.translation: 凯文声称，说他对足球不感兴趣是“一派胡言”。

sentences.sentence: This is, in a word, hogwash.
People talk about how aliens must be coming from other galaxies — that's hogwash!
sentences.translation: 也因为人们已经讨论过外星人必定来自于其他星系——这些都是废话！
